saveGame() - Method in class it.polimi.group03.activity.PlayBeadMeActivity
This method prepares the statistics data tha will be stored in the db, it's called only when the game has finished, calls the DAO layer that handle all persistence methods and uses the GameDAO.save(Statistic) method.
